function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survey participants feeling anxious and perceiving a high chance of getting infected by coronavirus","Impact":"Increased stress levels, potential decrease in technology adoption intention","Mitigation":"Implement mental health support measures, provide accurate information about COVID-19","Technologies":"Mental health support platforms, digital information dissemination","People":"Survey participants","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Conducting surveys in a global epicenter of the disease (New York)","Impact":"Heightened risk of exposure to contagious diseases for surveyors and participants","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols, utilize digital survey methods","Technologies":"Digital survey platforms, personal protective equipment","People":"Surveyors, survey participants","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Potential for future energy studies to overlook the impact of social-psychological factors on technology adoption and well-being during pandemics","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of human behavior and mental well-being in the context of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Incorporate social-psychological factors into study design, consider impact of pandemics on technology adoption","Technologies":"Social-psychological assessment tools, data analysis software","People":"Researchers, study participants","Owner":"Research team"}]}
